bibl.title: P. Oxy. XVII 2099: Evidence of an Early Split in the Tradition of Herodotus' Text?
bibl.note: P. Oxy. XVII, 2099 (= M.-P.3 481; LDAB 1125) may prove that in the 2nd century AD the transmission of the text of Herodotus was divided into at least two branches.
bibl.seg: Mirończuk Andrzej, P. Oxy. XVII 2099: Evidence of an Early Split in the Tradition of Herodotus' Text?
P. Oxy. XVII, 2099 (= M.-P.3 481; LDAB 1125) may prove that in the 2nd century AD the transmission of the text of Herodotus was divided into at least two branches.
